descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Monkey needs your help! The world is crumbling. Solve puzzles, find upgrades, and dodge enemies as you race against time to get to the top of the mysterious Monkey Tower. Every level brings new challenges - from collapsing platforms to pirate penguins and lava-filled gauntlets.

Play solo to master the tower, or compete with friends in fast-paced multiplayer races where every second counts. Upgrade your cards, unlock new abilities, and prove you’ve got what it takes to become the ultimate climber.

Monkey Tower is a thrilling VR platformer packed with strategy, speed, and surprises - built for players who love to explore, optimize, and push their skills to the limit.
